features: CETAPHIL GENTLE FOAMING CLEANSER: Effortlessly removes dirt, oil and makeup without leaving skin feeling dry or tight
SOFTENS AS IT CLEANS: Infused with hydrating glycerin and essential vitamins B5 & E to help maintain skin natural moisture balance
INSTANT FOAMING ACTION: Self-foaming pump produces rich, gentle lather
NON-IRRITATING & FRAGRANCE FREE: Hypoallergenic formula is also noncomedogenic so it will not clog pores or irritate sensitive skin
DESIGNED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating
body.description: Cetaphil Gentle Foaming Cleanser - This instant foaming facial cleanser effortlessly removes dirt, oil and makeup. Infused with skin conditioners and a vitamin complex, it softens as it cleans without stripping skin of its natural moisture balance. The result is clean skin that feels fresh and healthy. This cleanser is fragrance free and dermatologist tested and is clinically shown to be non-irritating, hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CETAPHIL Gentle Skin Cleanser soothes as it cleans to replenish the skin's natural moisture barrier without leaving a residue that can clog pores. Gently removes dirt, makeup and impurities without stripping skin and helps to maintain the skin's natural pH balance. Leaves skin looking and feeling soft, smooth and healthy. This creamy, non-foaming cleanser effectively yet gently removes impurities through micellar technology. Like a magnet, micelles attract, capture and lift away dirt, oil, and makeup without harsh rubbing or drying. Clinically tested on sensitive skin, this soap-free, fragrance-free wash cleanses without irritation and is hypoallergenic. An essential face wash for all skin types and ideal for those with dry, sensitive skin. This specially formulated cleanser is gentler on skin than water. Ideal for use on even the most sensitive skin, and won't aggravate those with dermatitis, rosacea, eczema and acne-prone skin. Helps alleviate dryness associated with some acne treatments.

Sensitive Skin Loves Cetaphil CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin* *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL cleansers effectively yet gently clean without stripping or leaving skin feeling dry and tight. CETAPHIL skincare products are developed with and clinically tested by dermatologists. *IQVIA 2022

Steps for a sensitive skin care routine with Cetaphil Cleansing without water Step 1: Apply cleanser using hands or a facial cotton pad (recommended)Step 2: Gently smooth all over face to remove excess oil, impurities and makeup. If using hands to apply, wipe away with cotton pad or towelStep 3: Repeat if necessary, until skin looks cleansed. Rinsing not required Cleansing with water Step 1: Apply cleanser using hands or a facial cotton pad (recommended)Step 2: Gently smooth all over face to remove excess oil, impurities and makeupStep 3: Repeat if necessaryStep 4: Rinse with warm water and gently pat dry Follow with moisturizer to lock in hydration Skin cells do their greatest renewal and repair while you sleep at night, yet skin loses more water at night. Using a moisturizer before bed such as CETAPHIL Rich Hydrating Cream with hyaluronic acid helps boost skin’s moisture reserves and protect skin from dryness throughout the night so that the skin looks and feels refreshed. Complete your dry skin care routine with CETAPHIL A daily facial skin care routine with CETAPHIL cleansers and moisturizers designed for your skin type will help to leave your sensitive skin feeling refreshed and hydrated. All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating and dermatologist tested for sensitive skin.

Gentle Makeup Removing Wipes Gentle Skin Cleanser Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 15 Rich Hydrating Cream Hydrating Eye Gel Cream Skin Care Benefit Convenient cloths that effortlessly remove waterproof makeup and gently cleanses skin Gentle face wash that cleanses, hydrates and soothes skin Lightweight, oil-free lotion with SPF 15 hydrates while protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays Quick absorbing and non-greasy cream nourishes and rehydrates skin Unique gel-cream quickly absorbs to hydrate, brighten and smooth under eye area Skin Type Sensitive Skin / All Skin Types Dry to Normal Skin Types Sensitive Skin / Dry to Normal Skin Types Sensitive Skin / Dry to Normal Skin Types Sensitive Skin / All Skin Types Key Ingredients Aloe Vera, Chamomile and Green Tea pH balanced, Soap-Free Avobenzone 3%, Octocrylene 10% and Glycerin Hyaluronic Acid, ProVitamin B5, Vitamin E, Vitamin C and Olive Extract Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Chamomile Extract, Green Tea Extract and Licorice Root Extract Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't Clog Pores (Non-Comedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PUMP FIXED AS OF 12/17/2023
reviews.reviewText: First, this is the only sensitive face cleanser that I can use. I have Rosacea and nothing else is better for it than this cleanser - the FOAM CLEANSER THAT IS. Why? Because the ordinary pump cleanser from Citaphil has propylene glycol in it. For some reason, that ingredient is not in the foam dispenser. The propylene glycol is a really bad ingredient to be used in anything, and it really does make my face worse and I will not use it. Second, I, like many of you HATED the foam pump because it just was super hard to use. You had to pull it back out of the bottle every time you pumped down because it got stuck. What a pain in the caboose it was! But I had no choice but to buy it again and just live with the problem. SO HERE'S THE GOOD NEWS! I got my new order in today and the foam pump works beautifully. The older bottle had a blue pump and the new one is white. So I said the pump is fixed and I am just hoping it pumps beautifully all the way to the last drop and doesn't make a liar out of me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am not a fan of these bottles, after a while the pump gets hard to do. I love this soap, makes my face feel so clean and does not leave a film on my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best face cleaning item!!
reviews.reviewText: This product is excellent for cleaning your face. Doesn't dry out the skin. Leaves my face feeling clean and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the cleanser, hate the pump
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down my favorite cleanser. Leaves my face soft and moisturized, not dry. But the pump on the bottle is stupid! After a week of use, the pump sticks. And I have to pull hard to get it back up. It doesn’t pop back up as it should. Hence the 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Facial Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: One pump of this cleanser cleans your face. Rinses off easily with water. One bottle lasts a surprisingly long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best
reviews.reviewText: I was always a Clinique girl, I worked for them for several years. I’m a soap and water user, followed by good nourishment products. Cetaphil is one of the best. The foaming face wash lasts so much longer than regular pump. Big money saver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product great, bottle terrible
reviews.reviewText: I can't get it to work. I've bought 4 bottles so far and once you push down the top, it sticks down and you have to pull it back up to get another pump of product. Switching to the other one that has the regular pump instead of this foaming one.
Fácil de usar, deja el cutis limpio y suave.
Item received in good condition.lrodict was very good too
Súper el producto pues tiene buen precio en relación a la calidad , un buen producto, todos los días me lavo la cara y funciona muy bien.

reviews.reviewTitle: Formula is different from the ones sold in Singapore
reviews.reviewText: US and Singapore's bottle and formula are different. I find that US version is more much moisturizing as I can feel the layer of moisture film. Overall I love both versions.

Amo este jabón, me deja el rostro muy limpio e hidratado, no es nada agresivo, no deja sensación grasosa, hasta quita maquillaje, el producto dura un tiempo considerable así que creo que es buena la relación precio - duración
